node.title: Earn More Money On SteemIt - A Group Focused on Helping You Earn More For Your SteemIt Posts - The Unmentionables
node.author: fatpandadesign
node.body:
Tired of earning pennies for posts that you labored over for an hour +? Fear no more! ![steemit.jpg](https://steemitimages.com/DQmPfxoYePey1sXv5X6VmAzWCi6teZvjN12FHGRV2GqT6dV/steemit.jpg) The Unmentionables is a new SteemIt community focused on helping our members grow together and earn more for your well-written content. Stop spending hours writing incredible posts only to reach a small audience that only brings in small payouts. We help each other grow by increasing your following and post upvotes. We value great content, and help you earn the post rewards that YOU deserve!

Interested? Join our discord channel at: https://discord.gg/4UqNjs2

We understand how frustrating it can be to spend your valuable time, only to be disappointed with small payouts. Join our channel or message me on Discord (@FatPandaDesign) to join our group TODAY!

Some of my posts have earned between $50 to upwards of $200.

Stop wasting time, and start generating extra $ in cryptocurrency by joining our new group, tailored just for you!

PROOF:

node.title: How can bitcoin help you to earn money?
node.author: codingdefined
node.body:
![](https://steemitimages.com/DQmdxerxxNhRRGdbFGb87Q9uV7TfxGq36rDzmnX7zoXKxDH/image.png)
Source : https://www.flickr.com/photos/btckeychain/10680032615

At first, if you do not know about Bitcoin just read it, there are tons of articles online as well as in Steemit. Knowledge is required before investing.

Secondly, you need to purchase and keep it for long run. You should never worry about ups and downs in market. When it was started in 2009 it was 0.10$ Now peaking at 4200$. Almost spiked 42000 times. It has potential to reach 10000$ in a couple of years or even in this year.

The beauty of Bitcoin is still you can purchase with the whatever money you have. You can start with a minimum of 1$ / 65₹. 

If you are from India, we have mainly two BitCoin Exchange which works very well. Unocoin (have web page and mobile app) and Zebpay (only has mobile application).

1 - Unocoin

Unocoin is India’s leading bitcoin company. It enables Indians to buy, sell, store, use and accept bitcoin.

With a mission “to bring Bitcoin to billions”, Unocoin was founded in July of 2013 in the town of Tumakuru, Karnataka and is India’s first entrant into the bitcoin space. Later the company shifted its major operation to Bengaluru.

2 - Zebpay

Zebpay is the fastest and easiest way to Buy and Sell Bitcoins. We guarantee fast transaction processing and the best bitcoin rates. Download Zebpay app to get started.

**Be Careful**

Bitcoin is a virtual currency which is independent of the government and banks, so nobody controls the price.

The price of Bitcoin completely depends upon supply and demand, High demand, low supply raise its price every other day. Just like land and gold, Bitcoin is a scarce entity and you can only make money by holding it as long as you can. Bitcoin was never invented as an investment option, it was created as an alternative to fiat currency.

This is what the official Bitcoin site says:

![](https://steemitimages.com/DQmYoL7CzvPTneLVC2GAEQiuneukQvMnjx8igyo1t3e8QCK/image.png)

node.title: How popular is Steemit in Your Country
node.author: codingdefined
node.body:
I was curious to know how popular is Steemit in my country India. At first I went and check the Alexa rank of Steemit.

![](https://steemitimages.com/DQmP6PHYSTQhFWaJ4XKSveHfGA5eKUH7Kje9CH8ojCMvz4X/image.png)

With most of the users from United States, United Kingdom, South Korea, Germany and Japan. India is nowhere to be found. If you need to check more countries you have to buy their advanced plan.

![](https://steemitimages.com/DQmV5jz79vPxV7SLmTNpdpEjhmQzdYkgSU13S9BaWPnHrje/image.png)

One more interesting fact I have seen for Steemit is that 32.5% users are coming search whereas 14.5% from Social

![](https://steemitimages.com/DQmThzapoMsNFSxHt4gNf5evQUYSJA5kpn47w8ohwBcWtBq/image.png)

![](https://steemitimages.com/DQmZ8rXv51Vav6YswxJ3ahfX8bZwvgvEFZs2QqaovX4U9Rk/image.png)
